description.p: A HTML template is a Javascript function which returns a Javascript DOMElement object. The contents of the DOMElement depend on a HTML template defined in a file within the Javascribe application definition.
A HTML Template belongs to a template set, which becomes a Variable Type and System Attribute in the application. It can be invoked

The function is generally invoked, and the template rendered, by other HTML Template functions within pages (of the SPWA). It may also be invoked manually by a developer who is hand-writing Javascript code for the application.
